summary: Relating to the proposed Charter Amendment contemplated by Resolution 22395 and submitting the same to the qualified electors (voters) of the City of Seattle at a special election to be held therein on November 3, 1970; requiring the City Clerk to certify to the Director of the Dept. of Records and Elections of King County as required by law said proposed amendment in the form of specified ballot title and said amendment in full, and providing for publication thereof.
